</Multimedia_Sample> <Summary> <Abstract>This dataset contains the data used and collected to investigate the reliability of avalanche size estimates and avalanche outlines (see related publications). Namely this is #### Avalanche size estimates #### * the 10 pictures depicting avalanches * the survey results from the 170 participants #### Avalanche outlines mapped from oblique photographs #### * the pictures of the six avalanches * the avalanche outlines mapped by the 10 participants * the reference mapped from the georeferenced photographs #### Avalanche outlines from remotely-sensed imagery #### * the orthophotos in the four different resolutions (2m, 1m, 50cm, 25cm) * the area of interest (AoI) delimiting the research area * the avalanche mappings in each resolution for all five participants * the shade masks used to separate illuminated and shaded areas The acquisition of the orthophotos has been partially supported by the Swiss National Science Foundation (SNF; Grant N°200021_172800).</Abstract> </Summary> <Related_URL> <URL>https://www.envidat.ch/dataset/data-reliability-study-avalanche-size-and-outlines</URL> </Related_URL> <Metadata_Name>gcmd_dif</Metadata_Name> <Metadata_Version>VERSION 10.2</Metadata_Version> <Metadata_Dates> <Metadata_Creation>2023-07-14T09:04:23.078959</Metadata_Creation> <Metadata_Last_Revision>2024-12-09T15:47:10.780218</Metadata_Last_Revision> <Data_Creation>2023-07-14T09:04:23.078959</Data_Creation> <Data_Last_Revision>2024-12-09T15:47:10.780218</Data_Last_Revision> </Metadata_Dates> <Private>False</Private> </DIF>
